steps.title: Kill Hillock
steps.description: Kill Hillock at the end of the Twilight Strand

steps.title: Talk to Tarkleigh
steps.description: Enter Lioneye's Watch and talk to Tarkleigh to receive the reward

steps.title: Get Rolling Magma
steps.description: Complete Enemy at the Gate quest to get Rolling Magma gem

reward.name: Rolling Magma
reward.usage_notes: Start using as your main damage skill

steps.gear_focus: Look for 2-3 linked items with blue/red sockets

steps.title: Get Movement & Support
steps.description: Complete Mercy Mission and Breaking Some Eggs for Arcane Surge and Frostblink

reward.name: Arcane Surge
reward.notes: Link to Frostblink, keep at low level
reward.usage_notes: Link to Frostblink for mana sustain, keep at level 1

vendor.name: Frostblink
vendor.usage_notes: Your main movement skill for the rest of the game

steps.gear_focus: Need blue sockets for movement setup

steps.title: Kill Hailrake & Get Arc
steps.description: Kill Hailrake, get Quicksilver Flask, complete Siren's Cadence for Arc gem

reward.name: Arc
reward.usage_notes: Replace Rolling Magma with Arc as your main skill

vendor.name: Added Lightning Damage
vendor.usage_notes: Link to Arc for extra lightning damage

steps.gear_focus: Switch to Arc as main skill, need 2+ blue sockets
steps.currency_notes: Use Quicksilver Flask for movement speed

steps.title: Act 2 Setup
steps.description: Enter Act 2, complete Intruders in Black for Wave of Conviction

reward.name: Wave of Conviction
reward.usage_notes: Use before Arc to expose enemies to lightning damage

steps.currency_notes: Consider buying gear upgrades from vendors

steps.title: Get Auras
steps.description: Complete Lost in Love for Determination and Wrath auras

reward.name: Determination
reward.usage_notes: Activate for armor and physical damage reduction

steps.gear_focus: Need mana reservation for auras, consider reduced mana gems
steps.currency_notes: Visit Siosa in Library after A Fixture of Fate for missing gems

steps.title: Get Archmage Support
steps.description: Complete The Eternal Nightmare for Archmage Support and Spell Echo

reward.name: Archmage Support
reward.usage_notes: Add to Arc for massive damage scaling with mana

vendor.name: Spell Echo
vendor.usage_notes: Replace Added Lightning Damage with this for better clear speed

steps.gear_focus: Need 4+ linked item for Arc + supports
steps.currency_notes: Major power spike - Arc + Archmage + Spell Echo + Added Lightning
